name: WP-Filler
author: DanRice

sections.description:
This plugin lets you insert filler text into any page or post. To use, simply insert the shortcode (like the example below), where paragraphs = the number of filler text paragraphs you want to include.

[wp-filler paragraphs=”1″]
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload Wp-Filler.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [wp-filler paragraphs=”1″] shortcode into your page/post, specifying the number of paragraphs you want.

short_description: This plugin lets you insert filler text into any page or post (Lorum Ipsum standard).
